thread.title: Lovely friendly hotel in a superb location
thread.title_full: Lovely friendly hotel in a superb location - Review of Rome Style Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: abcdefgTelAviv
title: Lovely friendly hotel in a superb location
text:
We stayed 3 nights at this lovely Rome boutique hotel. Our two executive rooms were spacious, impeccably clean and nicely decorated. The beds were very comfortable. The bathrooms were also impressive with a strong shower and a good selection of toiletries.
The staff was very friendly, professional and efficient. The breakfast was fabulous with a great selection that will suit everyone. Finally, the location is
great â€“ minutes walk from Spanish Steps, Trevi Fountain and other main attractions. We highly recommend this Hotel.
